name: MFMailComposeViewController
desc: A standard view controller, whose interface lets the user manage, edit, and send email messages.

items.name: var mailComposeDelegate: MFMailComposeViewControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The mail composition view controller’s delegate.

items.name: protocol MFMailComposeViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: An interface for responding to user interactions with a mail compose view controller.

items.name: class func canSendMail() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean that indicates whether the current device is able to send email.

items.name: func setSubject(String)
items.desc: Sets the initial text for the subject line of the email.

items.name: func setToRecipients([String]?)
items.desc: Sets the initial recipients to include in the email’s To field.

items.name: func setCcRecipients([String]?)
items.desc: Sets the initial recipients to include in the email’s Cc field.

items.name: func setBccRecipients([String]?)
items.desc: Sets the initial recipients to include in the email’s Bcc field.

items.name: func setMessageBody(String, isHTML: Bool)
items.desc: Sets the initial body text to include in the email.

items.name: func addAttachmentData(Data, mimeType: String, fileName: String)
items.desc: Adds the specified data as an attachment to the message.

items.name: func setPreferredSendingEmailAddress(String)
items.desc: Sets the preferred email address to use in the From field, if such an address is available.

items.name: let MFMailComposeErrorDomain: String
items.desc: The domain used for error objects that are associated with the mail composition interface.

items.name: enum MFMailComposeError.Code
items.desc: Error codes for NSError objects that are associated with the mail composition interface.
